If your heart is filled with love to Christ, it will be demonstrated that He is stronger than the passions which have ruled you, whose indulgence have undermined noble impulses, and left the soul to the mercy of Satan's temptations. . . . When the heart of the sinner is touched, he yields his will to God's will. . . . He sees in Jesus matchless charms, and his heart is captivated. 
                                                                           160
